entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
